==Notes==
* When the target's HP is above 50%, Rehabilitate heals a flat 7 HP.
* When the target's HP is below 50% Rehabilitate heals 7 HP + (Target's Maximum HP - (2 × Target's current HP)).
** This can result in [http://i.imgur.com/QFEuTbS.png situations] where the amount of HP restored to the target far exceeds their maximum health. Due to the formula, a target with 7 hp or less will always be healed to max HP, regardless of what that HP maximum is.
* A single formula for both cases is:
** 7 HP + (Target's Maximum HP - (2 × Target's current HP)) (Min: 7 HP).
